thread.title: Dominic Bobiles

author: Dominic Bobiles
title: Dominic Bobiles
text:
I would like to share that my first time to use tawagpinas is a little complicated beacuse of the delayed reload but now i like it because they improve already, but one thing i can suggest is why you dont have any percent discount, i am buying every month but until now you dont have any discount to your costumers,
Thank you for your service and Good luck!
